original_title: Crossclub – The Legend of the Living Dead
overview: In 1969, a bloody cult ritual of the "Cross Club" ends with the intervention of a special squad. Only a baby and a little boy are among the survivors. 30 years later, perverse murders keep the whole city in turmoil. Andy and his colleague have been on the trail of the killer for some time, but they are treading water. Only when they are lured to Spain and come into possession of a miraculous liquid, the extent of the danger becomes clear. Because through this material it is possible to bring the dead back to life!
title: Crossclub – The Legend of the Living Dead
